thread.title: Thousands of students make their way to Granger Bay hotel
thread.title_full: Thousands of students make their way to Granger Bay hotel | News24

author: news24.com
title: Thousands of students make their way to Granger Bay hotel
text:
Cape Town - More than a thousands students have arrived at the Waterfront as they make their way to Granger Bay hotel.
University management is apparently holding a meeting at the hotel.
News24 reporter Thulani Gqirana said police were on their way to the scene.
Meanwhile, News24 reporter Vernon Pillay said students were calling for the "revolution" not to be televised. He said they also did not want photographs taken.
